attributes.action: Stop the inappropriate transition site for Travellers ,Creekmoor Poole Dorset.
attributes.additional_details:
Recently Poole Borough Council approved a motion to move forward to planning for construction of a traveller transition site at Creekmoor Poole Open from Easter to September Annually.
The site is dangerously contaminated with Asbestos ,Methane,and is a Flood plane for Hols Bay,this bill has been steam rolled through , with a few councillors who believe this is consultation  the council want to force this through and waste 250k on the site plus annual fees of 65k ,this is for nine pitches  .
 all other boroughs through out our UK will follow suit ,the same process lack of consultation putting it where suits them not residents.
Please sign this petition if you wish to support the actions of the Creekmoor Residents.
Stop this now Government we voted you in Democratically let your local boroughs know that residents wont 'put up with this lack of integrity shown
here by local Government officers who are meant to represent the whole borough not just there back yards..
